item.lanterns.broadsides-lantern.lantern: Lancia una bomba dall'alto che esplode dopo {{bombTime}} secondo. Infligge {{damage}} danni e può bloccare i Behemoth.
item.lanterns.broadsides-lantern.name: Lanterna poliedrica
item.lanterns.drasks-eye.lantern_ability: Scaglia un fulmine che infligge {{shockDamage}} danni folgoranti più volte lungo il suo cammino mentre attraversa i nemici.
item.lanterns.drasks-eye.name: Sguardo del Drask
item.lanterns.embermanes-rapture.lantern: Crea davanti a te una palla di fuoco che esplode dopo {{fireBallTime}} secondi, arrecando {{blazeDamage}} danni ardenti a tutti i nemici vicini.
item.lanterns.embermanes-rapture.name: Vampa di Embermane
item.lanterns.koshais-bloom.lantern_abil: Scatta in una direzione infliggendo {{terraDamage}} danni terrestri ai nemici vicini nel punto d'arrivo e ottieni {{percentLifesteal}} rubavita per {{lifestealTime}}.
item.lanterns.koshais-bloom.name: Bocciolo di rovi
item.lanterns.pangars-shine.lantern_abil: Crea una colonna di ghiaccio di fronte a te che infligge fino a {{frostDamage}} danni congelanti ai nemici vicini per {{damageTime}} secondi.
item.lanterns.pangars-shine.name: Aurora del Pangar
item.lanterns.recruits-lantern.lantern_a: Conferisce uno scudo da {{shield}} punti dalla durata di {{shieldTime}} secondi.
item.lanterns.recruits-lantern.name: Lanterna da recluta
item.lanterns.shrikes-zeal.lantern_abili: Crea un'aura che garantisce allo Slayer e agli alleati vicini il {{percentIncreasedMovementAndAttackSpeed}}% in più di velocità di movimento e velocità di attacco per {{attackSpeedTime}} secondi.
item.lanterns.shrikes-zeal.name: Fervore di Shrike
item.lanterns.skarns-defiance.lantern_ab: Circonda lo Slayer con un turbine di pietre che infligge {{terraDamage}} danni terrestri per {{damageTime}} secondi ai nemici nelle vicinanze. Inoltre, genera scudi da {{shield}} punti al secondo che si esauriscono dopo {{shieldTime}} secondi. (Massimo {{maxShield}} scudi)
item.lanterns.skarns-defiance.name: Sfida dello Skarn
item.omnicells.artificer.active: Comando: il tuo drone agisce in base al bersaglio.{{NL}}1. Slayer: rimuove gli effetti di stato negativi e fornisce un aura dell'Artificiere per {{statusRemovalTime}}s.{{NL}} 2. Terreno: crea un muro che blocca i proiettili ostili e fornisce un aura dell'Artificiere agli Slayer vicini per {{wallTime}}{{NL}} 3. Behemoth: marchia una parte che subisce +{{percentDamage}}% di danni per {{damageTime}}s.{{NL}} 4. Slayer a terra: rianima e fornisce aura dell'Artificiere per{{reviveAuraTime}}s (una volta ogni {{reviveCooldown}}s).{{NL}} Aura dell'Artificiere: ripristina {{auraHeal}} salute/secondo. A piena salute, fornisce {{auraShield}} scudi/secondo che durano per {{shieldTime}}s (massimo {{maxShields}} scudi){{NL}} Ricarica: {{cooldown}}s
item.omnicells.artificer.name: Artificiere
item.omnicells.artificer.passive: Aumenta la quantità di salute e scudi forniti da aura dell'Artificiere di {{healingAndShielding}} per ogni {{currentHealth}} di salute che possiedi al momento dell'attivazione.
item.omnicells.bastion.active: {{NL}} Scudo dell'Aurora: consuma i tuoi scudi e infliggi un {{percentShieldDamage}}% della quantità consumata come danni ai nemici vicini. {{NL}} Ricarica: {{damageCooldown}}s.
item.omnicells.bastion.name: Bastione
item.omnicells.bastion.passive: Aumenta tutti gli scudi ricevuti di un {{percentShieldIncrease}}%. Quando infliggi danni, hai una probabilità di ottenere {{shield}} scudi per {{shieldTime}} s (massimo {{maxShields}} scudi).
item.omnicells.discipline.active: Pugno ardente: {{blazeDamage}} danni ardenti. Para gli attacchi in arrivo. Fuoco interiore: quando pari, infliggi +{{percentParryDamage}}% danni e ottieni 1 carica di Fuoco interiore, che fornisce +{{percentCritDamage}}% di danni critici. Ricarica: {{cooldown}}s
item.omnicells.discipline.name: Disciplina
item.omnicells.discipline.passive: +{{percentCritChanceAndCritDamage}}% di probabilità di critico, +{{percentCritChanceAndCritDamage}}% di danni critici, -{{percentHealingReduction}}% di cure Stato Maestro di Disciplina: si attiva con 4 cariche di Fuoco interiore. +{{percentCritChance}}% di probabilità di critico e +{{percentDamageReceived}}% dei danni ricevuti per {{critChanceTime}}s. Consuma tutte le cariche di Fuoco interiore.
item.omnicells.iceborne.active: Lancia una lancia di ghiaccio che infligge {{frostDamage}} danni di tipo gelo, raddoppiati se lanciata in piena salute. Inoltre ti impedisce di barcollare e concede +{{percentLifesteal}}% di ruba vita per {{lifestealTime}} secondi. Tempo di recupero: {{cooldown}} secondi.
item.omnicells.iceborne.name: Sangue freddo
item.omnicells.iceborne.passive: Aumenta la salute massima di {{maxHealth}}. Guadagni {{percentLifesteal}}% di ruba vita e {{percentDamageReduction}}% riduzione danni, per ogni {{missingHealth}} salute mancante. Subire danni riduce il tempo di recupero dell'Abilità Attiva di {{cooldownReduction}} secondi (solo una volta ogni {{cooldown}} secondi).
item.omnicells.revenant.active: Patto oscuro: entra nello stato Redivivo, crea una Sfera del vuoto e sacrifica fino a {{healthDrain}} salute. Per ogni {{drainedHealth}} di salute perso, crei un viticcio che infligge {{umbralDamage}} danni oscuri e genera una Sfera del vuoto all'impatto. Sfera del vuoto: tocca per ottenere una carica di energia del vuoto, che fornisce +{{percentDamage}}% danni e aumenta la durata dello stato Redivivo di {{revenantDurationExtend}}s. Ricarica: {{revenantTime}}s.
item.omnicells.revenant.name: Redivivo
item.omnicells.revenant.passive: +{{percentLifesteal}}% di rubavita Stato Redivivo: impedisce tutte le cure per 15s. Quando lo stato di Redivivo termina, recuperi {{health}} salute nell'arco di {{healthTime}}s per ogni carica di energia del vuoto che possiedi.
item.omnicells.tempest.active: Scatto tempestoso: {{shockDamage}} danni folgoranti. +{{percentDamageToUnbrokenPart}}% di danno alle parti non lacerate per ogni {{percentMovementIncreaseThreshold}}% di incremento alla velocità di movimento. Dà la priorità alle parti non lacerate. Consuma una carica di Velocità. Ricarica: {{cooldown}}s.
item.omnicells.tempest.name: Tempesta
item.omnicells.tempest.passive: +{{percentAttackSpeed}}% di velocità di attacco Velocità: Ottieni una carica di Velocità quando schivi un attacco. +{{percentMovespeed}}% di velocità di movimento per {{stackTime}}s (massimo 5 cariche).
item.parts.aetherstrikers.mods.cyclonic-: Tempest Form duration increased by {{timeIncreased}} seconds. When Tempest Form has less than {{timeLess}} seconds remaining, deal +{{damage}}% damage.
item.parts.aetherstrikers.mods.echo-brac: Critical strikes increase the damage dealt by Karma Breaker's damage over time by {{damage}}% until the debuff ends or is refreshed.
item.parts.aetherstrikers.mods.inertial-: Surge deals +{{damage}}% damage. After surging, gain +{{speed}}% movespeed for {{speedTime}} seconds. Stacks up to {{speedStack}} times.
item.parts.aetherstrikers.specials.adama: Unleash energy in a focused blast, dealing {{damageBlast}} damage to the first enemy hit. Deals up to +{{damage}}% damage when Tempest Form and Karma Breaker's effects are active.
item.parts.aetherstrikers.specials.titan: Rilascia frontalmente un'ondata d'energia che infligge {{damageWave}} danni al bersaglio più vicino e {{damageNearbyTarget}} danni ad un massimo di altri due nemici a portata. Con attivi gli effetti di "Forma della tempesta" e "Distruttore del Karma" infligge fino a +{{damage}} di danni aggiuntivi.
item.parts.axe.mods.furious-axecore.name: Furious Axecore
item.parts.axe.mods.furious-axecore.part: Perfectly charged attacks grants +{{meter}} meter on hit, but no longer grant resolve.
item.parts.axe.mods.lightweight-haft.par: Movespeed while charging Horizontal Attacks is now increased instead of decreased and costs no stamina to maintain.
item.parts.axe.mods.overcharged-cylinder: Determination can now stack up to {{times}} times.
item.parts.axe.mods.railsplitters-cantee: Tonics consumed while your axe is thrown have +{{effect}}% effectiveness.
item.parts.axe.mods.volatile-axecore.par: Charging attack deals aoe damage to nearby enemies at each charge level.
item.parts.axe.specials.flight-of-ruin.p: Throw the axe forward, damaging enemies while thrown. Reactivate to call the axe and perform a powerful overhand swing that can generate determination.
item.parts.axe.specials.grim-onslaught.p: Throw the axe forward, damaging enemies in its path before landing a distance away. Hitting a Behemoth can generate Resolve and will bounce the axe back towards the user.
item.parts.axe.specials.relentless-onsla: Hurl the axe forward, damaging enemies in its path. Catch the axe to throw it again up to {{axeThrow}} more times in the next {{axeThrowTime}} seconds, dealing {{axeDamage1}}/{{axeDamage2}}/{{axeDamage3}} damage (further increased by determination). Does not build meter.
item.parts.chainblades.mods.demolition-b: Deal +{{damage}}% damage to minions, fauna and objects created by Behemoths. On killing a minion, fauna, or object, gain {{momentum}} momentum.
item.parts.chainblades.mods.hurricane-bl: Using Blade Spin grants stacking on-next hit damage that is consumed when using other attacks.
item.parts.chainblades.mods.lightweight-: Increase the length of your chains by +{{lengthBonus}}%. Your Chain Pull deals +{{damage}}% damage and generates an additional {{meter}} meter.
item.parts.chainblades.mods.momentum-bla: After using a special, your next special use within {{time}} seconds is free.
item.parts.chainblades.mods.serrated-bla: Bladed attacks have a chance to cause your next {{attacks}} lacerating attacks to deal +{{damage}}% wound damage.
item.parts.chainblades.specials.cruel-ri: Teleport forward with invulnerability and strike the nearest Behemoth part, dealing {{damage}} damage and applying a mark that deals {{damageMark}} damage per second for {{damageMarkTime}} seconds. When a mark expires, it deals {{damageMarkExpires}} damage for each other mark active at the time. Mark duration increased to {{timeMarkIncreased}} seconds if an attack is avoided during the teleport.
item.parts.chainblades.specials.insatiab: Push off a nearby target with invulnerability, then use primary or secondary attacks to perform a followup. Primary: A dash attack to the target that consumes {{momentum}} momentum. Secondary: A spinning slam that consumes all momentum to heal you and create a {{heal}} healing orb for each momentum consumed. Targets at or healed to full health gain {{damage}}% damage for {{damageTime}} seconds, stacking up to {{damageStack}} times. (Consume {{momentumIfNoFollow}} momentum if no follow up is performed.)
item.parts.chainblades.specials.reapers-: Push off a nearby target with invulnerability, then use primary or secondary attacks to perform a follow up. Primary: A dash attack to the target that consumes {{momentum}} momentum. Secondary: A spinning slam that consumes all momentum and deals greatly increased damage per momentum consumed. (Consume {{momentumIfNoFollow}} momentum if no follow up is performed)
item.parts.hammer.mods.antique-clip.name: Antique Clip
item.parts.hammer.mods.antique-clip.part: Ammo decreased to {{ammoDecrease}}, but bonus from aethercharged ammo is increased by {{percentDamage}}%.
item.parts.hammer.mods.impulse-crown.par: Aerial Strike grants increased damage dealt for {{damageTime}} seconds. Bonus is doubled if a Behemoth's head is struck.

item.parts.hammer.specials.concussive-sa: Loads ammo into the hammer before releasing, damage and interrupting behemoths.
item.parts.hammer.specials.ironheart-lan: Hold to load ammo into the hammer. Release to create an aether vent that buffs players who step over it, granting them +{{percentDamageReduction}}% damage reduction and up to {{healing}} healing over {{healingTime}} seconds when aethercharged.
item.parts.hammer.specials.mighty-landbr: Loads ammo into the hammer before releasing, creating an aether vent that buffs players.
item.parts.repeater.chambers.full-bore-c: Fires a piercing bolt in a line, dealing damage that falls as it travels.
Empowered: Deals greatly increased damage and pushes the slayer backwards.
item.parts.repeater.chambers.marksman-ch: Fires a shot in a line, dealing {{damage}} damage to the first Behemoth hit. If a part is struck, that part takes {{percentDamage}}% more damage from Shots for {{damageTime}} seconds.
Empowered: Damage bonus increased to {{empoweredPercentDamage}}%, and {{empoweredPercentAllyDamage}}% to all allies.
item.parts.repeater.chambers.salvo-chamb: Fires an explosive missile in a line, dealing {{damage}} damage in an area upon impact.
Empowered: Fires {{missiles}} missiles in a spread.
Launches a collectible buff a short distance, granting {{percentAttackSpeed}}% increased attack speed for {{attackSpeedTime}} seconds when collected.
Empowered: Grants the same buff to all Slayers.
item.parts.repeater.grips.saboteurs-grip: Launches an explosive mine that deals {{damage}} damage. Mine charges after a short period, increasing damage to {{increasedDamage}}.
Empowered: Deals {{empoweredDamage}} damage when charged and can interrupt Behemoths.
item.parts.repeater.mods.capacitive-maga: Using an ability returns {{ammo}} standard ammo to the magazine.
item.parts.repeater.mods.demolition-sigh: While empowered, deal +{{percentObjectDamage}}% damage to objects created by Behemoths.
item.parts.repeater.mods.extraction-cata: Reduce both ability cooldowns by {{cooldownReduction}} seconds when dodging through Behemoth attacks.
item.parts.repeater.mods.lightweight-fra: Gain {{percentMovespeed}}% increased movespeed when at {{currentAmmo}} or less ammo.

item.parts.repeater.mods.tacticians-maga: Empowered Reloading at exactly {{currentAmmo}} ammo decreases the cooldown of both abilities by {{cooldownReduction}} seconds.
item.parts.sword.mods.charged-swordfocus: Instead of dealing damage over time, Resounding Echo deals damage once after it expires and deals +{{percentDamage}}% total damage.

item.parts.sword.mods.keen-edge.name: Keen Edge
item.parts.sword.mods.keen-edge.part_eff: After dealing damage with the Bladesurge projectile, increase your movement speed by {{percentMovespeed}}% for {{movespeedTime}} seconds. Additionally, after the Bladesurge projectile travels a short distance, the damage is increased by {{percentDamage}}%.
Each Valour gained or spent restores {{health}} health
item.parts.sword.mods.recursive-hilt.par: Dealing damage with Bladerush restores {{stamina}} stamina and generates {{valour}} Valour over {{valourTime}} seconds. Does not stack.
item.parts.sword.specials.ardent-cyclone: Attiva a contatore pieno per roteare. Mentre sei in questo stato sei immune ai sussulti e infliggi {{damage}} danni per colpo ai nemici vicini per tutta la durata del l'abilità; inoltre guadagni {{valour}} punti Valore ogni {{valourTime}} secondi. Riattiva per eseguire un fendente che infligge {{reactivateDamage}} danni (+{{hitBonusDamage}} per ogni colpo infetto in rotazione) al primo nemico che colpisci.
item.parts.sword.specials.avenging-overd: Activate at full meter to enter Overdrive, gaining +{{percentAttackSpeed}}% attack speed and causing attacks to deal +{{aoeDamageMin}}-{{aoeDamageMax}} aoe damage. Reactivate to parry and riposte a Behemoth attack, dealing {{damage}} damage and granting {{valour}} Valour when successful ({{valourCooldown}} second cooldown)
item.parts.sword.specials.valiant-overdr: Activate at full meter to enter Overdrive, gaining +{{percentAttackSpeed}}% attack speed and causing attacks to deal +{{aoeDamageMin}}-{{aoeDamageMax}} aoe damage. Grants {{valour}} Valour immediately and then {{valourRegen}} Valour every {{valourTime}} seconds. Reactivate to dash in a direction (Costs {{valourCost}} Valour).
item.parts.warpike.mods.balanced-spearhe: Increases damage dealt by {{damageIncreasePierceAndHarvest}}% each time Piercing and Harvesting attacks are alternated. After the fifth alternating attack, increase damage dealt by {{damageIncreaseAfterFifthAttack}}% for {{duration}} seconds. Resets upon combo end.
item.parts.warpike.mods.barbed-spearhead: After a dodge piercing attack, gain +{{percentWoundDamage}}% wound damage for {{woundDamageTime}} seconds.
item.parts.warpike.mods.executioners-spe: Each time you wound or assist wounding a Behemoth, gain {{percentDamage}}% damage for {{damageTime}} seconds. Stacks up to {{stacks}}.
item.parts.warpike.mods.lightweight-shaf: Pike charge attack no longer costs stamina and always critically strikes.
item.parts.warpike.mods.munitions-amplif: Stored ammo quality increases slowly over time, up to max. Stored ammo quality is also increased by an additional {{ammoQuality}}%.
item.parts.warpike.specials.concussive-p: Press to convert meter into ammo. Hold to spend ammo to fire a missile that deals up to {{damage}} damage based on ammo quality and can interrupt Behemoths.
item.parts.warpike.specials.reckless-lea: Press to convert meter into ammo. Hold to spend ammo and perform a flying lunge attack that deals up to {{damage}} damage based on distance and ammo quality.
item.parts.warpike.specials.savage-wells: Press to convert meter into ammo. Hold to spend ammo to create an aura that buffs nearby allies with up to +{{percentCritChance}}% critical strike chance based on ammo quality for {{critChanceTime}} seconds.

Load {{magBombs}} Mag Bombs into your magazine. They attach to enemies and are detonated on Reload. The first Mag Bomb attached to each Behemoth part deals +{{damage}} damage.

Dash in a direction, becoming invulnerable for the duration. After dodging through an attack, fire {{miniShots}} mini-shots that always crit. While in Mag Bomb mode, fires {{magBombs}} Mag Bombs instead.
After a critical strike, reduce the cooldown of Mag Bomb mode by {{cooldownReduceTime}} seconds.
